Description:
Learn to build and deploy enterprise-grade agents with Copilot Studio, Microsoft Foundry, and the Microsoft Agent Framework. Explore live demos on integrating connected agents, custom models, and knowledge, deploying to Microsoft 365 Copilot, and enabling observability with unified tracing. Leave with future insights and guidance for a seamless Copilot Studio and Foundry experience.

Delivered in a silent stage breakout.
